description.value:
Make an unarmed Strike. If it deals damage to a living creature, you block that creature's inner life force.

The creature takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,void]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until the persistent damage ends.

If you're 18th level or higher, this deals @Damage[3d6[persistent,void]] damage instead.
